title: Large group of t209-2s for individual sale....significant price drop!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Large group of t209-2s for individual sale....significant price drop!
posts.post_content:
Quite a few t209s are available for sale or trade.  Prices and brief condition descriptions are below.  Prices include shipping and scans are available upon request.  Thanks in advance!
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]


t209-2 Ebinger (Wilmington) VG - mild corner wear, no wrinkling -- $110
t209-2 Beusewein (Charlotte) GD - one corner wrinkle, mild staining -- $90
t209-2 McKeavitt (Winston Salem) GD - one corner wrinkle, mild staining -- SOLD
t209-2 Stouch (Greenville) FR/GD - mild surface wear, no significant wrinkling -- SOLD
t209-2 Hearne (Wilson) PR/FR - wear on front -- SOLD
t209-2 Drumm (Greenville) PR/FR - WOF, rough lower corner -- SOLD
t209-2 Brent (Winston Salem) FR/GD - nicks on photo, no significant creasing -- SOLD
t209-2 Morgan (Goldsboro) FR - mild wrinkling/surface wear -- SOLD
t209-2 Boyle (Fayetteville) PR - wear/nicks on front -- $60
t209-2 Kelley (Wilmington) FR/GD - mild wrinkling -- $80
t209-2 Midkiff (Winston Salem) FR/GD - corner wear, edge chipping, no wrinkling -- SOLD
t209-2 Jackson (Spartansburg) FR/GD - heavy crease towards upper right corner -- SOLD
t209-2 Keating SGC 10 - nice except for damage to lower right hand portion of card (includes caption) - SOLD
t209-2 Ferrell PSA 1.5 - nice card...couple nicks on right border - SOLD

Tried to knock $20-$30 off of each of the cards.  I'll also discount for multiple purchases.  Updated list is above and scans are available upon request.  Thanks much!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Several t209-2s still available.  Updated list w/ prices is above.  Thanks guys!

Brian
